page.title: 11Llanilid Opencast Coal Site
page.content: In the area surveyed by our school the only remaining primary industry is the Llanilid Open Cast Coal Site located between Llanhari and Llanharan. The works was opened in 1970 and is owned and run by Derek Crouch, Contractors on behalf of the Open Cast Executive of the National Coal Board.The site covers an area of approximately 3200 hectares and has a maximum depth of nearly 140 metres.The amount of coal produced weekly ranges from 5000 tons to 8000 tons.There is a possibility of extending the site in the future to the west of the present workings towards Pencoed. The Open Cast Site is an important local employer and provides jobs for 240 people.
